scripts.remove-all-install: npm run remove-install; npm run remove-install-analyzer; npm run remove-install-astwalker; npm run remove-install-debug; npm run remove-install-lib; npm run remove-install-simulator; npm run remove-install-tests; npm run remove-install-url-resolver; npm run remove-install-remixd; npm run remove-install-solidity;
scripts.remove-install-astwalker: rm skm-astwalker/package-lock.json; rm -rf skm-astwalker/node_modules; rm -rf skm-astwalker/dist
scripts.remove-install-tests: rm skm-tests/package-lock.json; rm -rf skm-tests/node_modules; rm -rf skm-tests/dist
scripts.remove-install-url-resolver: rm skm-url-resolver/package-lock.json; rm -rf skm-url-resolver/node_modules; rm -rf skm-url-resolver/dist
